phrs.translation: 任何观点, 不管怎样, 三人工作位, 反正
双面劳伦斯, 永远的劳伦斯
不管怎么说良好的一天, 不管怎样的好日子

sentences.sentence: Well, anyways, she said it wasn't safe.
sentences.translation: 嗯，不管怎样，她说不安全。

sentences.sentence: "I reckon so," said Huckleberry; "anyways, I'm suited."
sentences.translation: “我想是吧，”哈克贝利说，“不管怎么说，我喜欢。”

sentences.sentence: She talks awful, but talk don't hurt--anyways it don't if she don't cry.
sentences.translation: 她只是说话很凶，可是说说又不会伤害你——只要她不哭就好了。
